ObjectClass.Name: Tech Mound
ObjectClass.Description:
Cloaked Tech Mound:
This Mound is a dedicated Tech support building
It is cloaked and inactive Does not detect

Objective.Name: Turn Auto Hierarchy ON
Objective.Details: \Enable Automatic Hierarchy\Makes units find higher ranked\commanders by proximity

Objective.Name: Turn Smart Idle ON
Objective.Details: \Enable auto-communication\Make units automatically request\and respond when help is needed\ Heal, Repair, Recover and Find

Objective.Name: Turn Auto Hierarchy OFF
Objective.Details: \Disable Automatic Hierarchy

Objective.Name: Turn Smart Idle OFF
Objective.Details: \Disable auto-communication

Objective.Name: Cloaking On
Objective.Details: \Enable cloaking\Disables all support functions\ (including Tech support) while active

Objective.Name: Uncloak
Objective.Details: \Disable cloaking\ Restores deactivated functions

Objective.Details: Biological light raider aircraft\Very fast with low combat stamina\Good scout and expendable harasser\Limited lifespan

ObjectClass.Name: Reaph Tech Beacon
ObjectClass.Description:
REAPH TECH BEACON: Defensive support building
Gives one costless tech upgrade Heals nearby units [50 /10s] Launches plasma and chrono bombs Can move itself

Objective.Name: Relocate
Objective.Details: \Deactivate to Move

Objective.Name: Clear Status and Nanite
Objective.Details: \Removes Status effects and Nanites\ from the target

Objective.Name: Chronobomb
Objective.Details: \Launch a missile that will\send all units in the target area\into the future\Max flight range: 375 spaces

Objective.Name: Chronobomb
Objective.Details: \Not Available\Must upgrade Weapons and\Chronoporting

Objective.Name: Plasma Bomb
Objective.Details: \Launch a plasma warhead\cruise missile that chronoports back\in time en route to the target\Max flight range: 300 spaces

Objective.Name: ChronoBomb
Objective.Details: \Launch a missile that will\send all units in the target area\into the future\Max flight range: 375 spaces

Objective.Name: Plasma Bomb
Objective.Details: \Not Available\Must upgrade Weapons

Objective.Name: ChronoBomb
Objective.Details: \Not Available\Must upgrade Weapons and\Chronoporting

Objective.Name: Upgrade Adv Structures
Objective.Details: \Enable building Spyre and Dome\Enable OCTO shield regen L1

Objective.Name: Upgrade Loligo Splicing
Objective.Details: \Enable advanced progeneration abilities\Enable building GARGANTUAN\ from OCTOPOD

Objective.Name: Upgrade Specials
Objective.Details: \Enable special abilities:\Freeze-stop and Nanite Infect\ \Blocks Weapons tech

Objective.Name: Upgrade Chronoporting
Objective.Details: \Enable self chronoports for all\Grekim units

Objective.Name: Upgrade Weapons
Objective.Details: \Enables Plasma Bomb and ChronoBomb\Upgrade Dome rate-of-fire\Enable OCTO shield regen L2\Blocks Specials tech

Objective.Name: Upgrade Chronoporting
Objective.Details: \Enable self chronoports for all\Grekim units\ \Must upgrade Adv Structures

Objective.Name: Upgrade Weapons
Objective.Details: \Upgrade advanced weaponry\ \Must upgrade Adv Structures

Objective.Name: Convert to Weapons Tech
Objective.Details: \Enables OCTO shield regen L2\and Medusa/Pharoligo Disruptor Beam\Increases Dome rate-of-fire\Blocks Specials tech
Enables Medusa/Pharoligo Disruptor Beam\Increases Dome rate-of-fire\ \WARNING: Mound can only have one\ active Tech function
